title: The Surprise That Leads to Tragedy

infobox.Title:: The Surprise That Leads to Tragedy
infobox.Japanese title:: サプライズは悲劇のはじまり  (Sapuraizu wa Higeki no Hajimari)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Hiroshi Agasa  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Miwako Sato
infobox.Animation director:: Asuka Tsubuki  Yui Ushinohama  Miho Tanaka  Kana Aoki  FALCO Suzuki  Yoshitsugu Hatano  Joji Yanase
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Atsuya Miura (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Sachi Kokuryu as Riko Totsuka  Yuto Suzuki as Yusuke Tsuda  Asami Sanada as Mai Takigawa

sections.Situation:
Mai Takigawa accidentally kills her boyfriend Yusuke Tsuda in self-defense after misunderstanding him as a burglar, but in reality, he along with Mai's best friend Riko Totsuka planned a surprise party for her birthday.

Takagi and Sato arrive at the scene to investigate, and also does Conan, who was at the apartment complex at the time and heard the scream along with Agasa and the Detective Boys. Conan and the police discover clues that make them think that there's more behind this case.

sections.Trivia: - The plot of this episode shares similarities with The Psychological Murder (笑える死体), the third episode of TV drama Furuhata Ninzaburō.
